mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CategoryTree AS ( SELECT cno, name, level, parent_idx, CONCAT(name) AS path FROM hanteo_board.category WHERE parent_idx IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT c.cno, c.name, c.level, c.parent_idx, CONCAT(ct.path, ' > ', c.name) AS path FROM hanteo_board.category c JOIN CategoryTree ct ON c.parent_idx = ct.cno ) SELECT cno, name, level, parent_idx, path FROM CategoryTree ORDER BY path;
